release_notes:
✅ Bug Fixes
Saldo calculation bug in ui/RegistrarView.py - Fixed the inverted balance calculation from saldo += d - h to saldo += h - d
_parse_float method - Rewrote to correctly handle Spanish (1.234,56), standard (100.00), and US (1,234.56) decimal formats
Missing method - Added cargar_datos alias in ContabilidadData.py for DashboardView compatibility
Missing method - Implemented get_movimientos_rango() in ContabilidadData.py for InformesView
✅ Exception Handling Improvements
